docs.text: 序言 欢迎来到生成艺术分享网站 一些文章( processing.hub ) 一起探讨 qq频道(点击) 生产工具processing + p5.js + raylib 导航 processing p5.js c++ 官网 https://processing.org/ https://p5js.org https://www.raylib.com 工具 https://processing.org/download https://p5js.net/ https://royqh1979.gitee.io/redpandacpp/ https://p5.xn--fiqs8s/002pcpad.html https://code.visualstudio.com/ https://p5.xn--fiqs8s/003phone.html https://coding.qq.com/p5-lab/ https://toolness.github.io/p5.js-widget/#quick-start 教程 https://processing.org/tutorials/ https://p5js.org/zh-Hans/learn/ https://www.raylib.com/examples.html https://www.yuque.com/processing.hub https://www.yuque.com/processing.hub 网址 案例 https://processing.org/examples/ https://p5js.org/zh-Hans/examples/ https://www.leangoo.com/kanban/board/go/2419758#/board_view https://gitee.com/p5cn/AllSketchs https://faculty.cc.gatech.edu/~turk/bio_sim/ http://www.generative-gestaltung.de/2/ https://timrodenbroeker.de/category/tutorial/ http://reas.com/ https://necessarydisorder.wordpress.com/ https://sighack.com https://g-e-n-a-r-t.com/concept.php https://processinghub.github.io/BaiAsk/ https://www.wolai.com/childhoodandy/7hqgxxawDAwo8Fhg43nsZC https://www.yuque.com/processing.hub/open/bwmnbn https://himco.jp/ 分享 https://www.openprocessing.org/ https://github.com/ https://www.shadertoy.com/ 社区 qq频道(点击) https://www.processing.love/ 书籍(中文) 语言权威指南（第2版） 互动编程 爱上Processing p5.js互联网创意编程 与arduino互动编程 创意编程 编程学习指南（第2版） 开发实战 互动编程艺术 可视化数据 代码本色 书籍(英文) Make Getting Started with Processing, First Edition Processing An Introduction to Programming Creating Procedural Artworks with Processing Built with Processing Processing 2 Creative Programming Cookbook Processing - eine Einführung in die Programmierung Processing Creative Coding and Computational Art (Foundation) Einführung ins Programmieren mit Processing The SparkFun Guide to Processing Learning Processing, Second Edition A Beginner's Guide to Programming Images, Animation, and Interaction Processing A Programming Handbook for Visual Designers, Second Edition Type + Code_ Processing For Designers by John Corrigan Processing for Android Create Mobile, Sensor-Aware, and VR Applications Using Processing Rapid Android Development Build Rich, Sensor-Based Applications with Processing The Nature of Code Simulating Natural Systems with Processing Visualizing Data Data-driven Graphic Design Creative Coding for Visual Communication Generative Design Processing 2 Creative Coding Hotshot Generative Art Programming for Artists Processing Creative Coding and Generative Art in Processing 2 Processing for Visual Artists How to Create Expressive Images and Interactive Art Algorithms for Visual Design Using the Processing Language Processing Le code informatique comme outil de création Aesthetic Computing Programming.Interactivity Making Things Talk Using Sensors, Networks, and Arduino to see, hear, and feel your world Making Things See 3D vision with Kinect, Processing, Arduino, and MakerBot Make Getting Started with Arduino Building Wireless Sensor Networks with ZigBee, XBee, Arduino, and Processing Physical Computing Sensing and Controlling the Physical World with Computers Processing and Arduino Workshop Material GettingStartedwithP5js HTML5 Games Most Wanted- Build the Best HTML5 Games Il Codice dei Cibernetici Introduzione alla Computer Art con Processing Make Getting Started with Processing.py 硬件与程序 硬件不论多少件,程序不论多少行,大致分为四类 硬件四件套: 输入设备 :键盘,鼠标,麦克风,摄像头,扫描仪,传感器. 存储设备 :内存,硬盘,u盘. 处理设备 : CPU,GPU. 输出设备 :显示器, 打印机. 程序四件套: 输入功能 :获取硬件输入的数据 存储功能 :数据临时存储在内存 处理功能 :对数据运算, 控制 输出功能 :数据展示控制台, 图形, 音频 p5js模板 <! DOCTYPE html > < html > < head > < meta charset = "utf-8" > < meta name = "viewport" content = "width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" > < script src = "https://lf26-cdn-tos.bytecdntp.com/cdn/expire-1-M/p5.js/1.4.1/p5.min.js" type = "application/javascript" >< /script> < style > canvas { position : fixed ; top : 0 ; left : 0 ; z - index : - 1 ; } < /style> < /head> < body > < /body> < script > function setup () { createCanvas ( windowWidth , windowHeight ); } function draw () { } function windowResized () { resizeCanvas ( windowWidth , windowHeight ); } < /script> < /html>
docs.title: 导航
